modelDescription: CurrencyConversion is the response that converts funds from from currency to to currency. Funds are converted on the from account in the profile_id profile.

endpoints.description: ConvertCurrency converts funds from from currency to to currency. Funds are converted on the from account in the profile_id profile.  This endpoint requires the "trade" permission.  A successful conversion will be assigned a conversion id. The corresponding ledger entries for a conversion will reference this conversion id
CurrencyConversion returns the currency conversion by conversion id (i.e. USD -> USDC).
